flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Arduino microcontroller
  • Any computer w/ internet

lines.text: Head over to Arduino.cc, and download the software, and extract it.
lines.text_raw: Head over to Arduino.cc, and download the software, and extract it.

lines.text: Plug in your Arduino Device. Older Devices will be installed automatically. New ones, (like the UNO) will require Drivers. But not to worry, as the software has drivers!
lines.text_raw: Plug in your Arduino Device. Older Devices will be installed automatically. New ones, (like the UNO) will require Drivers. But not to worry, as the software has drivers!

lines.text: Click NO if Windows asks you about Windows Updates.
lines.text_raw: Click NO if Windows asks you about Windows Updates.

lines.text: Click Install from a list or Specific location (Advanced)
lines.text_raw: Click Install from a list or Specific location (Advanced)

lines.text: Uncheck everything that Windows has selected (Except for: Include this location in the search)
lines.text_raw: Uncheck everything that Windows has selected (Except for: Include this location in the search)

lines.text: Navigate to your Arduino software folder (You extracted), and select the Drivers folder for searching in.
lines.text_raw: Navigate to your Arduino software folder (You extracted), and select the Drivers folder for searching in.

lines.text: Windows will begin installing the drivers, so be wait a little bit.
lines.text_raw: Windows will begin installing the drivers, so be wait a little bit.

lines.text: Now the drivers are complete, so head into the Arduino Software, and start coding!
lines.text_raw: Now the drivers are complete, so head into the Arduino Software, and start coding!

lines.text: Also, make sure to choose YOUR Arduino in the second picture.
lines.text_raw: Also, make sure to choose YOUR Arduino in the second picture.

guide.summary: You just got an Arduino board, and it wont work? Well, I will fix that for you!
guide.title: Install Arduino Drivers to Your PC
